belongs_to_collection.name: Honto Ni Atta! Noroi no Video Collection

original_title: ほんとにあった！呪いのビデオ51
overview: A collection of shivering psychic images received by general posts, "It really was! A video of the curse." It is also full of new posts that are being received one after another from all over the country. You can't sleep because of the fear of the shocking footage!
tagline: Can you face the truth reflected by the camera?
title: Honto ni Atta! Noroi no Video 51
